Community

Edit this page

Report an issue

Google Group

We host a community space for palaeobiologists using the Google Groups platform. This space provides an area to share ideas and resources, advertise opportunities, and network with colleagues in an informal setting. Questions related to Palaeoverse packages are also more than welcome. This space is unmoderated, but please be kind to others. We reserve the right to remove anyone harrasing individuals.

Twitter

We are active on Twitter, where we share updates and news on Palaeoverse, as well as resources for the Palaeobiology community. We are also more than happy to help circulate relevant news you wish to share with the community, just remember to tag @ThePalaeoverse and use the hashtag #palaeoverse.
